title: Billups, Rozier arrested in gambling investigations
content: Trail Blazers coach Chauncey Billups and Heat guard Terry Rozier have been arrested as part of a pair of investigations related to illegal gambling, FBI director Kash Patel announced.

title: No. 1 pick Flagg assesses Mavs debut: 'Not great'
content: Cooper Flagg became the fifth Dallas player to record a double-double in his NBA debut, but the results for him and the Mavericks against the Spurs on Wednesday night did not measure up to the anticipation.

title: Marathon record holder gets 3-year doping ban
content: Women's marathon world-record holder Ruth Chepng'etich has been banned for three years after admitting to a doping violation.

title: Wembanyama wows with 40-point performance
content: Victor Wembanyama paced the Spurs to a runaway win over the Mavericks, his 40 points the most for a player in a season opener in San Antonio franchise history.

title: Edgecombe's 34 most in debut since Wilt in '59
content: Sixers rookie VJ Edgecombe lit up the Celtics with 34 points on Wednesday night, the most in an NBA debut since Wilt Chamberlain had 43 in 1959, as the Sixers won 117-116.

title: Middleton: Reception in Milwaukee 'meant world'
content: After 12 seasons and 735 games with the Bucks -- highlighted by winning the 2021 NBA championship -- Khris Middleton played his first game as a visitor in Milwaukee on Wednesday night, this time as a member of the Wizards.

title: Payton: No intent to offend Wilson with comment
content: Broncos coach Sean Payton said he didn't mean to criticize Russell Wilson by saying he had told Giants officials that he had hoped to face him instead of Jaxson Dart

title: 'Banged up' KAT plays opener with Grade 2 strain
content: Knicks center Karl-Anthony Towns said he was "hurting" in Wednesday night's season-opening win over the Cavs, in which he had 19 points and 12 rebounds despite playing with a Grade 2 quad strain.

title: Vols' Vitello makes MLB history as Giants skipper
content: Tennessee coach Tony Vitello has been named the new manager of the San Francisco Giants, the team announced Wednesday.

title: üèà Bolts TE Gadsden benched by father in fantasy
content: Oronde Gadsden II will be starting in many fantasy football lineups this week -- but not in his own father's.

title: The best and worst NFL offseasons in hindsight: Barnwell stacks all 32 teams into seven tiers
content: The Colts' Daniel Jones deal looks great now; the Texans' OL deals do not. Let's review every team's signings, trades, hirings and draft picks with hindsight.

title: Ranking the most interesting College Football Playoff and conference races
content: We have just over a month until Selection Day and these battles for CFP slots and major awards should be fun.

title: Jerry Rice's unbreakable records: Why even Justin Jefferson has nearly no shot
content: Jefferson, Ja'Marr Chase and CeeDee Lamb produce huge numbers, but is there any chance they can catch Rice?

title: 'J Herbo' has turned on the turbo: Herbert is having a career-best rushing season
content: Quarterback Justin Herbert looks to continue to step up for the Chargers as a runner against the Vikings.

title: Top 100 men's NCAA basketball players going into 2025-26
content: From seniors who have taken the national stage before to freshmen entering the spotlight, here is our 1-100.

title: Bilas' 2025 preseason All-America teams
content: From three transfers on the first team to four freshmen on the second, here are Jay Bilas' All-America teams.

title: With Al Horford's arrival, the Warriors enter Steph Curry's final chapter
content: The Warriors have surrounded Curry with one of the oldest rosters in the NBA in search of another title.

title: Winter is coming: Premier League unveils new hi-vis Puma ball
content: The "Under the Lights" edition of the PUMA Orbita Ultimate PL will make its debut on Nov. 8 so fans will be able to see the ball on the pitch through winter.

title: Cl√°sico injury update: Will Huijsen, Raphinha return for Real Madrid-Barcelona?
content: Real Madrid host Barca in the first Cl√°sico of the season on Sunday. Both teams have plenty of injury concerns.

title: UCL talking points: Conte's rant, Liverpool's best XI, who is Cl√°sico-ready?
content: Was Antonio Conte's reaction to Napoli's 6-2 loss justified? What has Liverpool learned from thumping Frankfurt? ESPN's writers take a look at the biggest talking points after Matchday 3 in the UCL.

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 8
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: Five positive trends that will continue: D'Andre Swift leads the way
content: Highlighting players such as Swift, who are enjoying a good run in fantasy recently, and why it will continue.

title: Survivor pool strategy: Colts, Patriots among top options in Week 8
content: NFL survivor pool strategy, predictions and picks for ESPN Eliminator Challenge Week 8, including teams to pick or save for later.

title: Steelers' 1933 striped throwbacks, Chargers' navy look top NFL Week 8 uniforms
content: It's the debut of a throwback uniform for the Steelers in Week 8, while the Eagles will also be wearing kelly green.

title: Heavyweight fights we want to see in 2026: Fury-Joshua, more
content: Heavyweight Joseph Parker defends his interim title Saturday, but what other big fights can the division make in 2026?

title: Preseason transfer impact rankings
content: The top 25 transfers, ranked by impact this season -- beginning with South Carolina's Ta'Niya Latson.

title: Remembering Michigan State-Michigan and the birth of the 'Surrender Cobra' meme 10 years later
content: A stunning finish cemented Michigan State player Jalen Watts-Jackson and Michigan fan Chris Baldwin into college football history.

title: The U is back ... in the Bottom 10
content: As has become a midseason ritual, Miami suffered a loss it probably shouldn't have and ended up on our list.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Championship picture, schedule, stats and facts
content: Formula 1 ventures to Mexico City for round 20 of the 2025 season. Find out how the championship shapes up and everything you need to know for the weekend.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea to loan Barcelona goalkeeper Ter Stegen?
content: Chelsea are continuing to explore the market for a goalkeeper, with Barcelona's Marc-Andr√© ter Stegen a potential option on loan. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Trump Shouldn't Tell What India Will Do: Shashi Tharoor On Russian Oil Claim
content: As US President Donald Trump claimed that India will significantly reduce Russian oil imports by year-end, Congress MP Shashi Tharoor on Thursday hit back by criticising him for making announcements on behalf of New Delhi.

title: Saudi Arabia's New Grand Mufti Is 90, And His Views Are Stirring Debate
content: Saudi Arabia has appointed a conservative cleric in his nineties as its top religious leader, state media said, sticking with tradition even as rapid social changes upend the previously cloistered kingdom.

title: Amazon Outage Leaves Smart Mattress Cover Users in US Sweating
content: Several people in the US were left sweating overnight as their smart mattress covers became overheated and stuck in awkward positions after the Amazon Web Services outage.

title: EU Turns Frozen Russian Money Into Lifeline For Ukraine. Here's How
content: EU leaders on Thursday look set to give a preliminary green light to a mammoth new "reparations loan" for Ukraine funded by Russian frozen assets.

title: Man In Bengaluru Charged For Sexually Exploiting Woman He Met On Instagram
content: A 30-year-old man was booked for allegedly sexually exploiting a woman sales executive after befriending her on social media in Bengaluru, police said on Thursday.

title: Nationwide Special Intensive Revision Phase 1 Schedule To Be Out This Month: Sources
content: The Election Commission of India (ECI) is preparing to carry out a Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls throughout the country in phases.

title: "Bangladeshi Link" Claim in Indore Transgender Mass Suicide Attempt Case
content: There has been a sensational twist in the case of 24 transgenders who attempted suicide by consuming phenyl together in Indore.

title: Month Left For Chief Justice BR Gavai's Retirement, Process Begins To Appoint Successor
content: The government on Thursday initiated the process to appoint the next chief justice of India as incumbent B R Gavai demits office on November 23, sources said.

title: Friendship No Licence To Rape: Delhi High Court Denies Bail To Accused
content: The Delhi High Court has denied anticipatory bail to a man accused of raping a 17-year old girl while rejecting his contention that both were friends, saying friendship does not give licence to rape the victim repeatedly, confine her, or beat her

title: India's Kathakali Brings Mahabharata To Life In South Korea's Miryang
content: Heralding a new chapter of friendship and cultural exchange between India and South Korea, the inland city of Miryang, hosted a memorable performance of India's iconic classical dance form Kathakali on Thursday.

title: J&K Set For 1st Rajya Sabha Polls, National Conference, BJP In Key Contest
content: First Rajya Sabha polls since Jammu and Kashmir's downgrading to Union territory status are scheduled for Friday with political observers anticipating 3 seats for ruling National Conference and 1 for BJP, provided their strategies remain on course

title: Bihar Polls A Fight Between NDA's Vikaas And INDIA Bloc's Vinaash: JP Nadda
content: BJP chief JP Nadda on Thursday said that the assembly election in Bihar is a fight between 'Vikaas' (development) of the NDA and 'Vinaash' (destruction) of the INDIA bloc.

title: India Adds Hardware Worth Rs 79,000 Crore In Defence Shopping Cart
content: India will buy military hardware worth Rs 79,000 crore for the three armed services to boost their firepower and strength. The Defence Acquisition Council (DAC) held a meeting today under Defence Minister Rajnath Singh's chairmanship.

title: British Surfer And Friend Who Tried To Rescue Him Drown In Melbourne Storm
content: A surfer in distress and a friend who tried to rescue him both died in stormy weather off the coast of the Australian city of Melbourne, police said Thursday.

title: 'Wanted To Protect Sanctity': Bengal Cop On Row Over Kali Idol In Prison Van
content: A day after video clips of a Kali idol being shoved into a prison van in West Bengal's South 24 Parganas district went viral, the police defended their action, saying it was to save the dignity of the goddess.

title: "AI Supercycle" Underway, Says Nokia CEO, Dismissing Bubble Fears
content: Nokia's CEO Justin Hotard said artificial intelligence is driving a long-term growth trend that resembles the internet boom of the 1990s, but downplayed concerns about a potential bubble.

title: "Mafia Rule In State": KTR Takes On Congress Over Top Bureaucrat's Voluntary Retirement
content: Telangana's Revenue Secretary Syed Ali Murtaza Rizvi's move to take voluntary retirement has sparked the latest face-off between the state's ruling Congress and the opposition Bharat Rashtra Samithi or BRS

title: Centre's Key Changes To Content Rules After Legal Fight With Elon Musk's X
content: Following a legal battle with Elon Musk's X over social media guidelines, the Centre has made key amendments to the Information Technology law to "enhance transparency, accountability and safeguards".

title: Aviation Regulator Okays Private Hospitals For Pilots' Medical Tests
content: To streamline medical services in the aviation sector, the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) has approved several private hospitals across the country to conduct medical examinations for pilots and other licensed aviation personnel.

title: Google hits new milestone: CEO Sundar Pichai celebrates; Elon Musk responds
content: Google's Willow chip has achieved a verifiable quantum advantage, running a new algorithm 13,000 times faster than the best supercomputers. This breakthrough, named Quantum Echoes, can explain atomic interactions and paves the way for drug discovery and materials science. The verifiable result marks a significant step towards real-world quantum computing applications.

title: Historic defeat! India fall at Adelaide for first time in 17 years; AUS win series
content: Australia clinched the ODI series 2-0 against India. The hosts' bowlers made early inroads, but Rohit Sharma and Shreyas Iyer built a strong partnership. A late surge from Harshit Rana and Arshdeep Singh helped India post 264. Australia's chase saw steady contributions, with Cooper Connolly playing a key role to seal the victory.

title: 'Act of war': How Russia reacted to Trump's sanction fury
content: Russia has reacted furiously to new US sanctions targeting its oil sector, with former President Dmitry Medvedev labeling the move "an act of war." The sanctions, aimed at crippling funding for the Ukraine invasion, coincide with renewed Russian attacks and a collapse in planned diplomatic talks.

title: Denver Nuggets vs Warriors injury update: Who‚Äôs in, who‚Äôs out for today's game
content: The Denver Nuggets, fully healthy with their star trio, face the Golden State Warriors in a highly anticipated October 23, 2025, matchup. While the Warriors will be without Moses Moody and De'Anthony Melton, Stephen Curry and Jimmy Butler are expected to lead the charge. Denver's depth and clean injury report give them a slight edge against the favored Warriors.

title: Europe's space giants unite; joint venture formed to compete with Musk; Airbus takes max stake
content: Airbus, Leonardo, and Thales are merging their space businesses to form a new European entity capable of competing with SpaceX's Starlink. This strategic move aims to achieve significant cost savings and enhance competitiveness in the evolving space market. The combined company, expected to be operational by 2027, will employ 25,000 people and generate substantial annual revenue.

title: Smriti Mandhana shocked, makes U-turn after LBW scare; NZ players in disbelief
content: Smriti Mandhana's spectacular 109 powered Team India to a commanding position in the ICC Women's World Cup 2025. Surviving a tense lbw review, she went on to register her 14th ODI century, forming a record-breaking 212-run opening partnership with Pratika Rawal. Mandhana continues to dominate as the tournament's leading scorer.

title: Trump eases H-1B visa fee, but student caps cloud the future of Indian talent: Here's why
content: The Trump administration‚Äôs decision to ease the $100,000 H-1B visa fee brings relief to thousands of Indian professionals and students already in the US. However, a new cap limiting foreign students to 15% of total university admissions, with no more than 5% from any one country, casts uncertainty over future Indian enrolments and America‚Äôs talent inflow.

title: Iraq bans Roblox: Cites child safety issues; list of countries where it is banned
content: Iraq has banned the popular video game platform Roblox, citing child safety concerns and the game's alleged incompatibility with social values. The government claims the platform exposes young users to exploitation and cyber-extortion. Roblox denies these allegations, stating safety is a top priority and that communication features were previously restricted in Arabic-speaking regions. Iraq joins other nations with similar bans.

title: 'Had no choice': How a job agent duped Hyd man into joining Russian army; family fears for life
content: A Hyderabad man, Mohammed Ahmed, allegedly defrauded by a job agent and sent to Russia, has reportedly signed a one-year contract with the Russian army.  Trapped near the Ukrainian border, Ahmed expressed fear and a lack of choice, pleading for rescue. His family has appealed to the Indian government for his safe return.

title: Terry Rozier arrested in FBI sports betting probe; NBA rocked by scandal
content: Miami Heat guard Terry Rozier was arrested Thursday morning in Orlando as part of a federal investigation into illegal sports betting. The probe is reportedly linked to a 2023 game where unusual betting patterns emerged after Rozier's early exit. This development follows the Jontay Porter scandal and raises further concerns about NBA integrity.

title: 'Illegal immigrant': Indian-origin man arrested after major truck crash kills 3 ‚Äî watch
content: A 21-year-old Indian national, Jashanpreet Singh, faces charges after allegedly causing a fatal crash on Interstate 10 while driving an 18-wheeler under the influence. The incident, which claimed three lives and injured others, highlights concerns over commercial driver licensing for non-citizens. Singh had reportedly entered the US illegally in 2022.

title: Bihar polls: Prashant Kishor targets Tejashwi, takes 'jungle raj' jibe as MGB announces CM face
content: Prashant Kishor, leading the Jan Suraaj Party, critically commented on the Mahagathbandhan's decision to name Tejashwi Yadav as their chief ministerial candidate for the 2025 Bihar elections. He suggested this outcome was predictable given the alliance's history. The opposition bloc formally announced Yadav's candidature, aiming to unite against the NDA.

title: Child can cancel property deals by parents at 18: SC says no formal lawsuit needed
content: Minors can now challenge property sales by parents or guardians after turning 18 without a formal lawsuit. The Supreme Court ruled adults can repudiate such transfers through clear actions, like reselling the property. This decision clarifies that a suit isn't always necessary, especially if the minor remains unaware or in possession.

title: Who is Mukesh Sahani? Mahagathbandhan's deputy CM face; worked with SRK in 'Devdas'
content: The Mahagathbandhan has officially declared RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav as its chief ministerial candidate for the 2025 Bihar elections. Vikassheel Insaan Party chief Mukesh Sahani, known as the ‚ÄúSon of Mallah‚Äù, will be the deputy CM face. Sahani's journey from a small village to the film industry and his political alliance with the Grand Alliance are highlighted.

title: 'More of a boutique hotel': TV, fully-equipped toilet and more; photos show swish jail awaiting Choksi
content: Fugitive diamantaire Mehul Choksi, wanted for Rs 13,000 crore bank fraud, is set for extradition to India and will be housed in a specially equipped cell at Arthur Road jail.  Indian authorities presented evidence to a Belgian court showcasing the cell's comfort and security, adhering to European standards.

title: Trapped at the desk: Why 23% of US workers skip vacation despite paid leave
content: Despite widespread access to paid vacation, nearly a quarter of US workers did not take a single day off last year, FlexJobs reports. Heavy workloads, fear of falling behind, and insufficient PTO leave employees trapped in a cycle of constant work. Experts warn that cultural and structural reforms are essential to make rest a viable, sustainable priority.

title: Riley Gaines calls out media bias over Kyrie Irving, seeks Djokovic apology
content: Stephen A. Smith's shift in stance on Kyrie Irving's vaccine choice has drawn a reaction from Riley Gaines. Gaines pointed out that while Smith now supports Irving's personal decision, similar respect hasn't been extended to athletes like Novak Djokovic and Aaron Rodgers, who also faced criticism for their unvaccinated status.

title: WPL: Auction likely in Delhi on Nov 26-27; IPL auction in mid-Dec
content: The Women's Premier League (WPL) auction is scheduled for late November in New Delhi, marking a mega auction likely to reshuffle squads. The Indian Premier League (IPL) auction will follow in mid-December. The WPL's fourth season is set to commence in January 2026, advanced to conclude before the Men's T20 World Cup.

title: Hold your breath! Annual punishment begins as Delhi sees toxic PM2.5 levels
content: Delhi experienced its worst PM2.5 pollution levels of the year following Diwali, with concentrations soaring to dangerous heights. Analysis revealed alarming figures, with some areas exceeding national and WHO guidelines significantly. Even days later, pollution remained exceptionally high, posing serious health risks as fine particles penetrate the bloodstream.

title: Canada‚Äôs ‚ÄòMaple Dream‚Äô wanes: Student intake falls; India feels the pinch
content: Canada‚Äôs international education sector faces an unprecedented slowdown, with new student arrivals dropping nearly 60% in 2025 compared to last year. Tighter permit caps, stricter financial and work regulations, and revised post-study pathways have deliberately shrunk the pipeline. The decline hits classrooms, campuses, and local economies, with Indian students‚ÄîCanada‚Äôs largest overseas cohort‚Äîbearing the brunt of these structural changes.

title: New bank rules: Opt for up to 4 nominees from November 1; top points to know
content: Good news for bank customers! From November 1, 2025, you can nominate up to four individuals for your accounts, either simultaneously or in succession. This move by the Finance Ministry aims to streamline claim settlements across banks, offering greater flexibility and clarity for depositors and their chosen beneficiaries. Specific share allocations can also be designated.

title: Tragic! Pak cricketer's newborn baby dies; shares heartbreaking post
content: Pakistan all-rounder Aamir Jamal has announced the tragic passing of his newborn child. The cricketer shared a heartfelt message on social media, accompanied by a photo of his baby's hand. The cricket fraternity and fans have extended their deepest condolences and offered support to Jamal and his family during this incredibly difficult time.

title: Denied Rs 20, ‚Äòdrunk‚Äô teen slits classmate‚Äôs throat, injures self; both survive
content: A shocking incident unfolded at a tribal sports school in Andhra Pradesh where a 14-year-old student, allegedly under the influence of alcohol, slit a classmate's throat over a Rs 20 demand. The attacker then attempted self-harm out of fear. The injured student is recovering, and the accused faces de-addiction treatment.

title: Bhopal tragedy: Farmer dies at doctor's doorstep waiting for treatment
content: A 55-year-old farmer died outside a doctor's residence in Panna after allegedly being denied treatment. Villagers protested, accusing the block medical officer of intoxication and negligence. The doctor was removed from his post, and an FIR was registered following the incident.

title: Chennai horror: Debt-ridden bizman kills wife, sons, then himself
content: A Chennai businessman, burdened by heavy debts and business losses, tragically killed his wife and two sons before taking his own life. Police suspect sedatives were administered before the murders, with no signs of struggle. A suicide note cited inability to repay loans as the reason for the extreme act.

title: Bad air: Punjab official goes to put out farm fire, gheraoed for 2 hours in Mansa
content: Farmers in Mansa, Punjab, surrounded a Punjab Pollution Control Board official. The incident occurred after the official arrived to douse a farm fire. Farmers demanded more balers to manage crop residue. The official was held for nearly two hours before police intervened and secured his release. This marks the first such backlash against government officials this year.

title: ‚ÄòStrong immunity‚Äô: Russia hits out as Trump sanctions its oil firms
content: Russia has criticized the Trump administration's new sanctions on its oil firms, stating they are counterproductive to peace efforts in Ukraine and that the nation is immune to such restrictions. President Trump expressed frustration over a lack of progress in diplomatic talks with Vladimir Putin, hoping the sanctions on Rosneft and Lukoil would be short-lived.

title: Tejashwi to be INDIA bloc‚Äôs CM face, Mukesh Sahani among two deputies: Key takeaways
content: The Mahagathbandhan has officially declared Tejashwi Yadav as its chief ministerial candidate for the 2025 Bihar Assembly elections. Mukesh Sahani will be the deputy chief ministerial face. This announcement aims to present a united front against the ruling NDA. The alliance emphasizes its commitment to serving Bihar and bringing about change for its people.

title: No oil from Russia soon? Trump sanctions to hit India‚Äôs crude imports
content: New US sanctions on major Russian oil firms Rosneft and Lukoil are likely to lead India to halt crude oil procurement from Russia, which constituted over 36% of its imports this year. Indian refiners are reviewing documentation to ensure compliance, with upcoming orders expected to shift to alternative sources.

title: Watch: How Gill reacted to a fan yelling 'Pakistan zindabad' after shaking hands - new video
content: Indian captain Shubman Gill was surprised when a fan shouted "Pakistan Zindabad" after shaking hands in Adelaide. The pre-meditated encounter, captured on video, occurred as India prepares for a crucial second ODI against Australia, trailing 0-1 in the series.

title: Massive fire breaks out at Mumbai high-rise: Several people trapped
content: A Level-II fire erupted at the JNS Business Center on SV Road in Jogeshwari West, Mumbai, this morning around 10:50 am. Fire brigade teams are actively engaged in dousing the flames at the high-rise building. The origin of the blaze remains unknown as investigations are ongoing. Further updates are expected.

title: UP man kills wife, buries body beneath bed; sleeps over it for 12 days
content: A man in Bahraich, UP, has been arrested for allegedly killing his wife and burying her body under their bed, sleeping over it for 12 days. Phoola Devi's family grew suspicious after noticing freshly plastered mud and alerted the police, who discovered her decomposed body with multiple injuries. The motive is suspected to be infidelity.

title: ‚ÄòInka kachra inke ghar mein dalo‚Äô: Harpalpur CMO dumps garbage in BJP leader‚Äôs home ‚Äì video
content: A municipal chief in Madhya Pradesh allegedly ordered garbage dumped inside a former BJP leader's home after finding litter outside. The official claims he asked the leader to use a waste cart, but the leader became argumentative, leading to a fine. The BJP leader denies this, stating he only pointed out delayed waste collection.

title: Delhi's air quality remains 'very poor'; Anand Vihar hits 'severe' category
content: Delhi's air quality remains hazardous post-Diwali, with 'severe' pollution levels recorded in Anand Vihar.  Many areas are in the 'very poor' category, prompting authorities to activate Stage II of the GRAP.  Residents report breathing difficulties as smog blankets the city, with transport and industries contributing significantly to the pollution.

title: Veteran composer-singer Sabesan passes away; Who was Sabesan aka Sabesh?
content: Veteran music director M.C. Sabesan, known as Sabesh, has passed away at 68. He, along with his brother Murali, composed music for numerous Tamil films, beginning their careers in the late 1990s under the mentorship of their elder brother Deva. The duo's notable works include 'Imsai Arasan 23am Pulikesi' and 'Thavamai Thavamirundhu'.

title: 'Woh saatva over...': Stump mic captures Rohit's hilarious chat with Iyer - watch
content: Rohit Sharma and Shreyas Iyer shared a funny conversation during their partnership in the second ODI against Australia. India posted 264 for 9 after a challenging start. Rohit and Shreyas built a crucial partnership to rescue the team. Harshit Rana and Arshdeep added vital runs towards the end.

title: JNU student polls on Nov 4: Check full timeline; key dates to know
content: Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) is set for a politically charged phase as the Election Committee announces the 2025-26 JNUSU election schedule. Polling on November 4 will decide key student leadership positions amid heightened campus activity. Media speculation suggests a fiercely contested election, with alliances and manifestos reflecting both campus concerns and broader socio-political currents.

title: Sushant Singh Rajput‚Äôs family rejects CBI closure report, calls it ‚ÄòEyewash‚Äô
content: Sushant Singh Rajput‚Äôs family has rejected the CBI closure report, calling it an ‚Äúeyewash.‚Äù The CBI found no evidence of wrongdoing by Rhea Chakraborty. The family‚Äôs lawyer criticized the report‚Äôs lack of supporting documents and plans to file a protest. The Patna court will hear the case on December 20.

title: Russia launches strikes across Ukraine, killing 6; seizes two more villages
content: Ukraine endured a devastating overnight missile and drone assault, claiming six lives and injuring at least 36. Critical infrastructure, including power plants and a kindergarten, was hit. Meanwhile, Russia announced capturing two more villages, as former US President Trump suggested Ukraine might cede territory for peace.

title: Ranking every open Power 4 job in college football
content: all four power conferences have had a firing in the first half of the season . no coach is safe, but a strong line of storms has been forecasted . a total of 298-150 coaches have been fired from the power conference .

title: Big month for Isro: LVM-3 to launch CMS-03 on November 2; Nisar to begin operations soon
content: Chethan Kumar is a Senior Assistant Editor with the Times of India. Aside from specialising in Space & Science, he has reported extensively on varied topics, with special focus on defence, policy and data stories. He has covered multiple elections, too. As a young democracy grows out of adolescence, Chethan feels, there are reels of tales emerging which need to be captured. To do this, he alternates between the mundane goings-on of the Common Man and the wonder-filled worlds of scientists and scamsters, politicians and soldiers. In a career spanning nearly 18 years, he has reported from multiple datelines ‚Äî Houston, Florida, Kochi, Hyderabad, Chennai, Sriharikota (AP), NH-1 (J&K Highway), New Delhi, Ahmedabad, Raichur, Bhatkal, Mysuru, Chamarajanagar, to name a few ‚Äî  but is based out of Bengaluru, India‚Äôs science capital that also hosts the ISRO HQ. Read More

title: Experts' picks and best bets: Is anyone taking Ciryl Gane to upset Tom Aspinall?
content: aspinall will make his anticipated return to the Octagon against former interim champion Ciryl Gane on saturday . he owns the UFC record for shortest average fight time at 2 minutes, 2 seconds . the heavyweight is taking on the fourth-mostaccurate heavyweight in UFC history .

title: VUL's Newman keeps drawing complaints and controversy
content: a former coach is accused of using false promises to lure athletes and coaches to a historically black private university in Virginia . he has worked as a football coach and athletic director since 2021 . some of the lawsuit allegations are denied by the university's attorney in a court filing .

title: Who will win Dodgers-Blue Jays World Series? MLB scouts, execs and managers make their predictions
content: the Toronto Blue Jays host the los Angeles Dodgers in Game 1 on friday . the 2025 world series is nearly upon us . what should you expect from the team's pitching staff? which X factors will determine this October's last team standing?

title: Ranking ringless NBA teams by chances to win their first title by 2031
content: the 2014 season was the only seven-year stretch in league history that featured seven unique champions . only two of those seven were true first-time winners . the 2025 Oklahoma City Thunder are technically multitime champions, but the pattern still underscores how much the NBA has been stingy about letting new teams into its championship club.

title: What we're hearing on the WNBA's CBA negotiations
content: a year ago, the WNBA players' association announced the players would opt out of their current collective bargaining agreement with the league that was set to expire following the 2025 season . the players outlined their desire for a new economic model based on equity . there are no signs a deal will be put in place by the date that the current deal expires, on Oct. 31 .

title: US court grants Tellis' pre-trial as lawyers say nothing sinister about his China links
content: a US district court has directed the release of Indian-American scholar Ashley Tellis in a purported espionage case . Tellis' attorneys portrayed the case as a justice department overreach against a patriot whose "scholarly curiosity," not malice, led to benign hoarding of classified documents . the documents were routine work products from his advisory role, they say .

title: Buzz for Week 8: The latest on the trade deadline, QB futures, more
content: the "Get Up" crew weighs in on the state of the Dolphins . insiders Jeremy Fowler and Dan Graziano have been making calls to sources around the league . they asked around about two struggling AFC East teams, the 0-7 Jets and the 1-6 .

title: Defence ministry clears weapons purchase plan worth Rs 79,000 crore - details
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." Read More

title: Isak's exit leaves room for Ekitike to be Liverpool's main man
content: arne slot's side ended their losing streak with a 5-1 victory in the champions league . the win answered most of the questions being asked of the premier league champions . but the downside of the performance at Deutsche Bank Park was the 45-minute no-show of Alexander Isak .

title: Coaching tracker for 2026: Toronto Tempo hire Sandy Brondello
content: the expansion Toronto Tempo and Portland Fire join the WNBA next year . the franchise will have an international coach to launch the team . Brondello is a native of australia who has two decades of coaching experience in the league . she has been a head coach for 13 seasons and an assistant for eight seasons .

title: What if Ohtani WAS on that plane to Toronto? Inside an alternate World Series universe
content: Shohei Ohtani and Vladimir Guerrero will be at the plate for the 2025 world series . there is another world, one not as far-fetched as you might think . Roki Sasaki could be playing the part of rookie sensation for the Blue Jays .

title: Special control rooms set up across Andhra Pradesh to tackle cyclone impact
content: District administrations have urged the public to stay indoors and to contact the local control rooms in case of emergencies such as flooding

title: Congress claims PM Modi skipping ASEAN summit to avoid Trump
content: Jairam Ramesh alleges Prime Minister opted for virtual participation to avoid ‚Äúbeing cornered‚Äù by the U.S. President

title: India‚Äôs Russian oil imports in October remain ‚Äòrobust‚Äô: Kpler data
content: Kpler infers that U.S. President Donald Trump‚Äôs recent remarks on India looking to cut Russian oil were likely pressure tactics than a reflection of imminent policy change. ¬†

title: Bombay HC forms high-powered panel to save Sanjay Gandhi National Park
content: SGNP is one of the few national parks in the world located within city limits; spread over 104 sq km, it is home to leopards, over 1,000 plant species, and Kanheri caves dating back to the 1st century BCE

title: Gold, graft, and governance: Sabarimala Ayyappa temple hogs the headlines, yet again
content: Seven years after the turbulent protests following a Supreme Court order permitting the entry of women of all ages to Sabarimala Ayyappa Temple, the hill temple has once again hogged the headlines. This time, it‚Äôs the alleged theft of gold from the gold-inlaid copper plates of the Dwarapalaka idols of the temple that has triggered the controversy. Hiran Unnikrishnan reports on the issue that may leave political as well as social aftershocks

title: Kerala to make driving test stringent with focus on pedestrian safety, parking etiquette
content: Motor driving schools will be frequently subjected to surprise checks by MVD officers, while training on roads or in classrooms, to see to it that candidates are properly trained. If the norms are not followed, the driving instructor‚Äôs licence should be cancelled immediately

title: People won't forget 'jungle raj' for another 100 years: PM Modi's attack on RJD-Congress ahead of Bihar polls
content: He said the Bihar Assembly polls are about writing a new chapter in the history of the state and that youngsters will play a key role in it

title: Rivalry between Vijayawada MP Sivanath and Tiruvuru legislator Srinivasa Rao intensifies
content: The TDP leaders are at odds, with the legislator accusing the Parliamentarian of taking huge money to fetch ticket to contest in the run-up to elections, which the latter denies

title: Schoolchildren, teachers learn basics of farming at a sanctuary
content: Children and teachers from five Tiruchi schools participated in a farming workshop at the GREENS Biodiversity Sanctuary this week, where they learned to transplant paddy saplings.

title: A.P. government on high alert as heavy rains likely to continue
content: Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu reviews the situation from Dubai through video conference; Collectors told to take measures to prevent loss of life and property

title: DGGI unearths GST scam in Harihar, accused sent to judicial custody
content: It found fake invoices valued at approximately ‚Çπ112 crore resulting in fraudulent availment and utilisation of Input Tax Credit

title: Modi-led NDA rally to pave way for landslide win in Bihar: Minister Nitin Nabin
content: The BJP leader says people of Bihar had consistently supported NDA as they had seen visible change on the ground

title: Joshi says Priyank Kharge is issuing statement for publicity
content: The Union Minister for Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution has said that the Congress leaders are making irresponsible statement for the sake of being in the news

title: Bihar elections: Tejashwi vs who? INDIA bloc ends suspense over CM face, NDA plays waiting game
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." Read More

title: CM Chandrababu Naidu indifferent to medical needs of the poor, alleges APCC president Sharmila
content: Seeing a conspiracy to weaken the Aarogyasri scheme, the Congress leader demands immediate release of dues to the network hospitals

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Verdict in Chittoor mayor couple murder case on October 24
content: The case, which has been pending for nearly a decade, faced several adjournments due to procedural and evidentiary reasons

title: Government writes to CJI Gavai on recommendation for successor
content: As per seniority norms, Justice Surya Kant is the next in line to become the 53rd Chief Justice of India

title: Artist Hanan Benammar condemns vandalism of her works in Kochi
content: She says her works ironically is a response to several acts of silencing and tone policing and, at times, censorship she experienced as an artist. Kerala Lalithakala Akademi to take legal action against the man who vandalised the works

title: 10-year-old masters a difficult craft, weaves a perfect Kannadippaya at science fest
content: Tribal student draws praise for the technique she used to weave a smaller version of the tribal mat in a day. The art is dying in the tribal areas because of the high level of dexterity it demands and the paucity of skilled craftspersons.

title: Top officials start functioning from the new CRDA office in Amaravati
content: Inaugurated by Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu recently, the new CRDA headquarters will play a crucial role in monitoring the ongolng capital works

title: Lalu Prasad fielded candidates against Congress, INDIA bloc allies to make Tejashwi Bihar CM face: Deputy CM Samrat Choudhary
content: The BJP leader also accused the RJD of ‚Äúperpetuating 15 years of misrule in Bihar characterised by loot, fear and corruption‚Äù

title: Literacy drives Kerala‚Äôs development, says President Droupadi Murmu
content: She addresses the valedictory function of the platinum Jubilee celebrations of St. Thomas College at Pala.

title: Tamarind tree planted by woman revolutionary finds place at Kolkata film festival
content: Documentary on tree planted by Partition refugee and freedom fighter Parul Mukherjee to premiere at KIFF

title: Will ensure early release of Vizianagaram fishermen from Bangladesh, says Union Minister Rammohan Naidu
content: Eight fishermen from Pusapatirega and Bhogapuram mandals of Vizianagaram district have been caught by the Bangladesh Coast Guard a couple of days ago for crossing the international waters

title: Telangana eyes ‚Çπ1 lakh cr investments in life sciences by 2030: Industries Minister in Melbourne
content: Comprehensive ‚ÄòRoadmap 2030‚Äô positioning Telangana as global Life Sciences hub readied by State government, Sridhar Babu told AusBiotech International Conference 2025 in Melbourne

title: India and Bhutan review bilateral security cooperation, border management
content: Both delegations expressed satisfaction regarding the cordial and constructive discussions and reiterated their resolve to work together towards ensuring a safe, secure and prosperous border region

title: Controversy erupts over photo of President‚Äôs visit to Sabarimala
content: Photo posted by Rashtrapati Bhavan of her praying at the Malikappuram Devi temple shows face of deity, allegedly in violation of traditional protocol

title: Post-Deepavali rush: Namma Metro sees heavy crowds as commuters return after holidays
content: As night buses began arriving at the city‚Äôs main areas, large groups of passengers from various parts of Karnataka and neighbouring states flocked to metro stations to reach their destinations.

title: ‚ÄòVote theft‚Äô in Karnataka: SIT zeroes in on six suspects who charged money for deleting¬†votes¬†in¬†Aland
content: According to Aland MLA Patil, applications were filed to delete 6,994 'Congress votes' comprising Dalits and minorities.

title: DAC clears ‚Çπ79,000 crore defence proposals to boost tri-service capabilities
content: According to the Defence Ministry, the approvals granted by the Defence Acquisition Council will cover a wide spectrum of platforms and systems designed to enhance lethality, mobility and intelligence-gathering capabilities across services

title: IMD forecasts new low pressure over Bay of Bengal on October 24
content: The system is likely to move west-northwestwards and become more marked during subsequent 24 hours, it said

title: Death of Wayanad DCC treasurer, son: Congress MLA, three others charge-sheeted
content: N.M. Vijayan, son found dead on December 27, 2024, reportedly after consuming poison. The four accused named in the chargesheet are I.C. Balakrishnan, MLA, former DCC president N.D. Appachan, and Congress leaders K.K. Gopinathan and P.V. Balachandran. Chargesheet submitted at Sulthan Bathery Judicial First Class Magistrate Court  with statements of over 100 witnesses and digital evidence

title: Daily wagers hold protest; demand tabling of regularisation panel report in Kashmir Assembly
content: The workers' body also threatened to hold an aggressive protest on October 27 if their demands are not met, asserting that daily wagers have been struggling for over two decades

title: Teenager killed after being hit by train while shooting video near railway tracks in Puri
content: A purported video of the incident, recorded on the mobile phone of his friend, has surfaced on social media, police added

title: Over 60 land in Bhopal hospitals due to use of ‚Äòdangerous‚Äô carbide guns on Deepavali
content: Over 60 people, mostly children, were hospitalised in Bhopal after injuries from calcium carbide guns during Deepavali celebrations; health officials condemn their use and call for stricter sales enforcement

title: Quarter-century-old Kudumbashree hotel in Kochi staring at potential shutdown
content: City Corporation issues notice demanding that rent dues of ‚Çπ1.38 lakh be cleared. New Akshaya hotel at Ponnurunni was designated a Janakeeya Hotel under State government‚Äôs Hunger-Free Kerala project, under which the facility is eligible for rent waiver

title: Curtains down on Hasanamba festival: Temple doors closed, over 26 lakh visitors recorded in 14 days
content: More than 26.13 lakh people visited the temple this year during the festival that began on October 9. The temple administration earned a revenue of ‚Çπ21.82 crore by way of selling tickets.

title: Congress MP Shafi Parambil alleges he was attacked in Perambra by ‚Äòtainted‚Äô police officer
content: Exhibiting videos of the incident, Vadakara MP claims the police official‚Äôs action against him seemed deliberate as he was attacked at least thrice with lathi

title: Argentina football friendly: Traders at Kaloor stadium in Kerala get partial reprieve as shutdown cut to three weeks
content: Over 100 tenants at Kochi stadium were initially ordered to close for a month starting October 25. However, after a meeting with GCDA chairperson, closure has been postponed to October 30, with a possible reopening on November 20

title: Column | Manjari Chaturvedi: didi¬†to all qawwals
content: The dancer pioneered Sufi Kathak to draw attention to¬†Qawwali¬†and began a project to preserve the folk art form

title: T.N. CM Stalin to inaugurate Solar bus terminal in Erode on November 27
content: The ‚Çπ74.90-crore facility, spread over¬†19.9 acres, is nearing completion, with painting, tile-laying, and electrical works progressing at a brisk pace

title: Two-year-old girl drowns in waterlogged plot in Chennai
content: According to the police, the child had reportedly wandered out of the house while her mother was asleep and drowned in the waterlogged plot located around 20 feet away

title: Decoy operation foils illegal sex determination in Mysuru district
content: The operation has exposed a serious violation of the Pre-Conception and Pre-Natal Diagnostic Techniques Act and the Medical Termination of Pregnancy Act, said an official

title: WazirX to restart on October 24, along with crypto trading and withdrawals
content: WazirX founder Nischal Shetty said that crypto trading and withdrawals will both start from October 24

title: Obituary reference to Satya Pal Malik triggers heated exchange between NC and BJP in J&K Assembly
content: At the conclusion of the obituary references, Chief Minister Omar Abdullah said Malik must have acted with the belief that he was doing good

title: Watch: Four wanted Bihar gangsters killed in police encounter in Delhi
content: A major overnight operation in Rohini, Delhi, ended with four wanted Bihar gangsters shot dead by a joint team of Delhi and Bihar Police. The slain criminals-Ranjan Pathak, Vimlesh Mahto, Manish Pathak, and Aman Thakur, were wanted for multiple serious crimes. Police say the accused opened fire first, leading to retaliatory firing. Investigations continue into the gang‚Äôs network and financial links.

title: Education, economic progress will reduce caste and religious divisions, says VIT Chancellor
content: MDMK leader Vaiko also spoke at the annual memorial lecture in honour of Dravidian stalwarts ‚ÄòPeriyar‚Äô E.V. Ramasamy and former Chief Minister C.N. Annadurai

title: Telangana bureaucrats caught between the devil and the deep blue sea, says KTR
content: BRS working president K.T. Rama Rao says senior bureaucrat S.A.M. Rizvi opting for VRS indicates the crossfire in which All India Service officers are caught in Telangana

title: Dhinakaran demands crop loss assessment in Cauvery delta
content: In a post on social media, Mr. Dhinakaran said the latest spell of heavy rainfall had damaged not only paddy but also other foodgrains, such as pulses and millets

title: Bihar election 2025: Full list of BJP candidates and their constituencies
content: BJP has fielded Satish Kumar Yadav from Raghopur Assembly seat to take on former Deputy Chief Minister and RJD Leader Tejashwi Yadav.

title: ‚ÄòBachke rehna re baba‚Äô: Congress claims PM not going for ASEAN summit to avoid meeting Trump
content: Congress claims that the reason for his not going there was that the Prime Minister doesn't want to be cornered by U.S. President Donald Trump

title: Bihar Assembly elections 2025: When will Bihar vote? Key dates, phases, and counting schedule
content: The Election Commission of India has announced a two-phase schedule for the Bihar Assembly elections 2025, with 121 constituencies voting on November 6 and 122 on November 11, followed by counting on November 14.

title: Super GST-Super Savings catches attention of everyone with special awareness programmes: Vizianagaram Collector
content: Speaking to media, he said the Union and State Governments‚Äô initiative on reduction of tax slabs had benefited people with the significant drop in prices of all essential goods, consumer products, two wheelers, cars and other products

title: Botanists from Davangere discover three new plant species; another reported for the first time in Karnataka
content: Botanists estimate existence of around 30,00,000 plant species across the globe and so far 2,50,000 species are known while 27,50,000 species are to yet be discovered

title: Bihar Assembly elections 2025: JD(U) releases full list of 101 candidates
content: The Janata Dal (United) has released the complete list of 101 candidates for the upcoming Bihar Assembly elections

title: Three arrested within 12 hours of firing on cow protection group member in Hyderabad
content: The shooting stemmed from a dispute after accused Mohammad Ibrahim Qureshi suffered losses of about ‚Çπ1 crore when victim allegedly intercepted his cattle transport vehicles

title: Senthamangalam DMK MLA K. Ponnusamy passes away
content: On October 23, he complained of chest pain and was first rushed to the Kolli Hills Government Hospital
